name: Shimano XC3 Cycling Shoes - Women's
description: Ride with confidence. The XC3 have a precise fit system and robust upper that lets your feet breath when you put the hammer down. Equipped with a glass reinforced nylon midsole, you get great power transfer.Synthetic leather upper is easy to clean and breathes well.Glass fibre reinforced nylon sole provides stiff pedalling platform.Boa® L6 dial fit system keeps the shoe aero’.Offset strap design reduces pressure on the top of the foot.XC racing pattern tread offers  secure grip on the ground an easy cleat engagement on the pedal.
